旜字的基本解释

旜
zhān
古同“旃”。

旜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhān］
［《廣韻》諸延切，平仙，章。］
亦作“旜1”。亦作“1”。亦作“1”。
(1)赤色、无饰、曲柄的旗。
(2)泛指旌旗。
(3)表彰。
(4)之，焉。
(5)通“氈”。

旜字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【方字部】　旜； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页485第14
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?諸延切，音饘。【說文】旃，或从亶。【周禮·春官·司常】通帛爲旜。【註】通帛，謂大赤，從周正色。【又】孤卿建旜。【註】孤卿不畫，言奉王之政敎而已。

旜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
旜字的起名意思

暂无。

旜
Basic explanation of words
旜
zhān
Gu Tong is "Zhan".
旜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhān］
["Guangyun" Zhu Yanqie, Pingxian, chapter. ]
Also known as "旜1". Also called "1". Also called "1".
(1) A red, undecorated, and crank flag.
(2) Refers to banners in general.
(3) Commendation.
(4) It, Yan.
(5) Through "felt".
旜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Jixia】【Fangzi Department】　旜; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 485 No. 14
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Zhu Yanqie, sound. [Said the text] Yang, or from you. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Sichang】Tong silk is 旜. 【Note】Tongbo, called Dachi, from Zhou Zhengse. [Also] Guqing Jiantong. [Note] Guqing doesn't paint, and just talks about the king's government.
